snippet: Inklings of a weekend resolution to the debt limit impasse flushed out short positions, leaving stocks higher even after a jump on Thursday.
abstract: Stocks rise, extending gains from a major rally in previous session, as investors are hopeful for a solution to end the partial government shutdown and raise federal borrowing limit to avoid a possible default.
lead_paragraph: Inklings of a weekend resolution to the debt limit impasse flushed out short positions, leaving stocks higher even after a jump on Thursday.

headline.main: Murmurs of a Breakthrough on Debt Limit Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Murmurs of a Breakthrough On Debt Limit Lift Shares
